title: A Casual Conversation
story: Hi. My name is Mary. Hello, Mary. I'm Michelle. It's nice to meet you, Michelle. Thank you. What do you want to do? I have to go to class now. Yeah. Me too. We'll meet later? Yes. We can meet after school. Okay. I'll see you then.
summary: Mary and Michelle have a brief conversation, discussing their plans to meet after school.
image: Two people engaged in a friendly conversation.
